participant_1.background:
I don't have much time to worry about my appearance, but I do try to keep clean and presentable.
I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.
my friends like watching it to.
I'm always trying to find new ways to make our home feel more like our own.
I read a poem or two to get my creative juices flowing before starting my day.

participant_2.background:
I believe in a progressive tax system, which means that people with higher incomes pay a higher percentage of their income in taxes than people with lower incomes
i have started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers.
i have never traveled out of the country.
My weight is healthy and I am happy with it.
i hate paying my bills.

content.text: Hey there! How are you today?
Doing great! I just finished working on a new comic book, so I'm feeling pretty happy with myself.
Oh that's awesome! What's it about?
It's about a group of friends who go on an adventure in a fantasy world.
That sounds really cool! I love fantasy.
Thanks! I've been working on it for a while, so I'm glad to hear you like it.
I'm sure it's great! What are you going to do next with it?
I'm going to submit it to a few publishers, and hopefully I'll be able to get it published.
That's awesome! I hope you get it published!
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
Sounds like we have a lot in common!
Yeah, we do! It's nice to meet someone who has similar interests.
